<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataRO extends data { const CODE = 'RO'; const PREFIX = 40; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[237]\d|[89]0)\d{7}|[23]\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '[23][13-6]\d{7}|(?:2(?:19\d|[3-6]\d9)|31\d\d)\d\d'=>array( 'fixed', ), '7120\d{5}|7(?:[02-7]\d|1[01]|8[03-8]|99)\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '90[036]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '801\d{6}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
